response.overview: Max Amini’s comedy special is here, straight from the world tour—where the crowd was on fire, but his TSA stories might land him on a no-fly list.  In Randomly Selected, Max brings his signature charm, quick wit, and razor-sharp crowd work to screens from all across the globe. His unique blend of humor is on full display while reflecting on a career that’s put him in front of crowds on almost every continent. At Max’s show you see people from all backgrounds, colors and cultures it’s like being at the United Nations of comedy.  From chaotic travel adventures to family anecdotes and unexpected moments with the audience, this special is a celebration of everything that makes Max one of the most dynamic comedians of his time. Buckle up for laughs, surprises, and the one-of-a-kind storytelling that only Max Amini can deliver.  Randomly Selected is not just a comedy special; it’s an experience. Enjoy it!
response.tagline: You’ve been randomly selected in my shows, now prepare to be Randomly Selected in your homes!
response.title: Max Amini: Randomly Selected
